businesses.name: Prohibition Liquor Co
businesses.business_details: Prohibition Liquor Co was established in 2015
businesses.product_details: We produce a selection of craft Gin, from your contemporary London Dry to Barrel Aged through to Over Proof Gins all designed to be able to be drunk neat or in your favourite cocktail.
businesses.new_products: We are now producing hand sanitiser! One bottle of 100ml Hand Sanitiser with any 500/700ml bottle of gin purchased.
businesses.headline: Award Winning Gin Distillery
